mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE , MEMBER_INQUIRY_NAME FROM MEMBER_INQUIRY_TYPE ORDER BY MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE
SELECT MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE , MEMBER_INQUIRY_TITLE , MEMBER_WRITE_DATE , USER_NO FROM MEMBER_INQUIRY_WRITE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE , MEMBER_INQUIRY_TITLE , MEMBER_INQUIRY_DETAIL , MEMBER_WRITE_DATE , MIW.USER_NO , MIW.MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE , MIT.MEMBER_INQUIRY_NAME , MII.MEMBER_INQUIRY_IMG_NO , MII.MEMBER_INQUIRY_IMG_NAME , MII.MEMBER_ATTACHED_INQUIRY_IMG_NAME FROM MEMBER_INQUIRY_WRITE MIW JOIN MEMBER_INQUIRY_TYPE MIT ON MIW.MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE = MIT.MEMBER_INQUIRY_CODE JOIN MEMBER_INQUIRY_IMG MII ON MIW.MEMBER_INQUIRY_WRITE_NO = MII.MEMBER_INQUIRY_WRITE_NO WHERE MIW.USER_NO = #{userNo};
